description.lang: Z-Wave Thermostat.Separate Heat and Cool SetpointsUp to 3 Stage Heat, 2 Stage CoolRemote control of most functions via ZwaveTwo part design or New 1 piece designBacklit LCD Wall Display UnitFor standard gas/electric or heat pump HVAC systemsReplaces existing 4 or more wire thermostats without the need for additional wiring (TZ16/TZ40)Optional Remote Temperature SensorPower: 24VAC supplied from HVAC systemSupports the ZWave thermostat device class
